H0.text: How many triangles are on a backgammon board. 32

H1.text: How many triangles are on a backgammon board. 20

H2.text: How many triangles are on a backgammon board. 36

H3.text: How many triangles are on a backgammon board. 24

A4.text: The points form a continuous track in the shape of a horseshoe, and are numbered from 1 to 24.
